CURATORS_INFO_1: Our company has more than 15 employees, including 12 experienced mentors who have won international grants and have experience in education abroad. These mentors come from different countries, including the USA, France, Hungary, and Korea. Our team also includes a native speaker from America who checks the quality of our documentation.
CURATORS_INFO_2: In addition to the mentors, our team consists of four English teachers, an administrator, and an accountant. We select the most talented and hardworking individuals from all over the world and train them for one month before allowing them to work with our clients. Only after obtaining sufficient qualifications do we allow our mentors to work with clients.
CURATORS_INFO_3: Our mentors have graduated from programs such as El-Yurt Umidi and Global UGRAD, as well as other prestigious programs.
